title: Pelosi sets record for longest continuous speech in the U.S. House
text:
Pelosi sets record for longest continuous speech in the U.S. House   01:52 
U.S. House Democratic Leader Nancy Pelosi spoke for eight hours on the House floor where she told stories about the so-called Dreamers who were brought to the United States illegally as children. Her speech was intended to protest the budget deal that does not include protections for Dreamers.   
U.S. House Democratic Leader Nancy Pelosi spoke for eight hours on the House floor where she told stories about the so-called Dreamers who were brought to the United States illegally as children. Her speech was intended to protest the budget deal that does not include protections for Dreamers.  //reut.rs/2sedpMe
